DOC.detailed_description: The following abbreviation use Adverse Event section : - international normalized ratio ( inr ) - Common Terminology Criteria Adverse Events ( ctcae ) - Not Otherwise Specified ( nos ) - Gastrointestinal ( gi ) - Central nervous system ( cns ) - Absolute Neutrophil Count ( anc ) - Alanine aminotransferase ( ALT ) - Aspartate aminotransferase ( AST ) - Creatine phosphokinase ( cpk ) - Gammaglutamyltransferase ( ggt ) - Genitourinary ( gu ) - Atrioventricular ( av )
DOC.criteria: Ages eligible study : 18 year , Genders eligible study : Patients life expectancy least 12 week Patients histologically cytologically document Hepatocellular Carcinoma ( HCC ) Patients must least one tumor lesion meet follow criterion : ( 1 ) Accurately measure least one dimension accord RECIST ( Response Evaluation Criteria Solid Tumors ) ( 2 ) Not previously treat local therapy Patients ECOG ( Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group ) PS ( Performance Status ) 0 , 1 , 2 Previous concurrent cancer distinct primary site histology HCC , EXCEPT cervical carcinoma situ , treat basal cell carcinoma , superficial bladder tumor ( Ta [ Noninvasive papillary carcinoma ] , Tis [ Carcinoma situ : `` flat tumor '' ] & T1 [ Tumor invade subepithelial connective tissue ] ) . Any cancer curatively treat > 3 year prior entry permit Renal failure require hemo peritoneal dialysis History cardiac disease Active clinically serious infection Known history human immunodeficiency virus ( HIV ) infection Known central nervous system tumor include metastatic brain disease Patients clinically significant gastrointestinal bleeding within 30 day prior study entry
